name: ShipWreck'd
description:
Spawn ships to take control of strategic locations and defeat your opponent by taking out their cannons!

Looking for online players? Join our Discord!

Thanks for playing my game :) Enjoy, and please leave your thoughts about gameplay, balance and general appreciation!

Gameplay:

- Spawn ships to defeat your enemy

- Your ships will move towards a set waypoint, them move towards the closest enemy cannon

- Ships auto-attack the first encountered enemy

- Send ships towards control points to capture them

- Control point give extra income

Controls:

- Use W/S or arrow keys to select a spawn point. 

- Right-click on the map to set the waypoint for the selected spawn point. 

- Click on ship icons to spawn ships

Known issues:

- There are no status messages for Network issues. For example, when a player disconnect, you simply get thrown back to the MainMenu without a notification

- No Sound yet
